roleset.name: (cause to) decrease in size or intensity

example.name: de-escalate the violence
example.text: The administration , hoping [*PRO*] to de-escalate the violence , is appealing to both sides .

roleset.note: DEESCALATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'de-escalate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. (from deescalate.01-v predicate notes)
